metadata.synopsis: Cazador greets Companion or Avatar Astarion in the ritual room, pleased Astarion has returned and he'll finally be able to complete the ritual. The other 6 vampire spawn are in their places for the ritual, ringing the room, held in spectral chains. Astarion starts nervous, but gets angrier as Cazador goads him until Astarion attacks. Cazador uses his magic to immobilise Astarion and then telekinetically flings him into his place (a spot directly behind Cazador) for the ritual, which then begins as the dialog ends and combat starts.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Recruit - recruit him as Avatar or CompanionAstarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Black Mass RitualApproach Cazador to start the dialog

60.speaker: Cazador Szarr
60.text: Who stands before us? Is this truly our prodigal son?
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion straightens up as Cazador snaps at himNodeContext: Snapping

68.speaker: Cazador Szarr
68.text: Do not slouch before me, boy! Have you no respect for yourself?
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion straightens up as Cazador snaps at himNodeContext: Snapping

20.speaker: Cazador Szarr
20.text: Look at you, crawling back after abandoning your family. You should be begging our forgiveness.

15.speaker: Astarion
15.text: Every mistake, every slip was punished!
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

7.speaker: Cazador Szarr
7.text: I strove for perfection in all things - even those as imperfect as you.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

105.speaker: Cazador Szarr
105.text: A pity you amounted to so little, despite my efforts.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

116.speaker: Astarion
116.text: No! No, fuck you and fuck everything you've ever done to me.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

95.speaker: Cazador Szarr
95.text: Oh thankless child. Did I not bless you with our immortal gift? Did I not make you what you are?
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

146.speaker: Astarion
146.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

119.text: You truly forgot my power. You truly thought our bond as creator and creation was all that stopped you from killing me.
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leaps towards Cazador, ready to kill. Cazador doesn't move or flinch, he simple slams the butt of his staff on the floor and Astarion freezes, hands inches from Cazador's face.

59.speaker: Cazador Szarr
59.text: You truly forgot my power. You truly thought our bond as creator and creation was all that stopped you from killing me.
59.context: NodeContext: Disappointed - almost sad - at how stupid Astarion's been

25.speaker: Cazador Szarr
25.text: You are weak, my child. You are a small, pathetic little boy who never amounted to anything.
25.context: NodeContext: Astarion's body is locked in place. He tries to resist, but can only grunt in pain

139.speaker: Astarion
139.context: NodeContext: Astarion's body is locked in place. He tries to resist, but can only grunt in pain

31.speaker: Cazador Szarr
31.text: But today, you will finally do something worthwhile. You will burn, and I will ascend.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Leaning in to whisper in Astarion's earNodeContext: Leans in to whisper in Astarion's ear

17.speaker: Astarion
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador points his staff at Astarion to yeet him into place for the ritual, but nothing happens. Cazador looks confused.

40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador points his staff at Astarion to yeet him into place for the ritual, but nothing happens. Cazador looks confused.

114.speaker: Narrator
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador points his staff at Astarion to yeet him into place for the ritual, but nothing happens. Cazador looks confused.

4.speaker: Cazador Szarr
4.text: Even now you resist? Very well, but you will not stop my ascent. Ecce dominus!

141.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

71.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

67.speaker: Cazador Szarr
67.text: Who stands before us? Is this truly our prodigal son?
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion starts to hunch - like an angry, cornered dog

48.speaker: Cazador Szarr
48.text: Do not slouch before me, boy! Have you no respect for yourself?
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion straightens up as Cazador snaps at himNodeContext: Snapping

28.speaker: Cazador Szarr
28.text: Look at you, crawling back after abandoning your family. You should be begging our forgiveness.

122.speaker: Astarion
122.text: Every mistake, every slip was punished!

131.speaker: Cazador Szarr
131.text: I strove for perfection in all things - even those as imperfect as you.

120.speaker: Cazador Szarr
120.text: A pity you amounted to so little, despite my efforts.

78.speaker: Astarion
78.text: No! No, fuck you and fuck everything you've ever done to me.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: We're here for justice. You're going to pay.

5.speaker: Cazador Szarr
5.text: I will not speak to cattle! This is between me and the boy.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: We're here to stop the ritual.

121.speaker: Cazador Szarr
121.text: The cattle low about things of which they know nothing.

97.speaker: Cazador Szarr
97.text: This ritual is centuries in the making. Nothing shall stop it now.
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

91.speaker: Astarion
91.text: That's what you think, you son of a bitch!
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

82.text: You truly forgot my power. You truly thought our bond as creator and creation was all that stopped you from killing me.
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leaps towards Cazador, ready to kill. Cazador doesn't move or flinch, he simple slams the butt of his staff on the floor and Astarion freezes, hands inches from Cazador's face.

50.text: You truly forgot my power. You truly thought our bond as creator and creation was all that stopped you from killing me.
50.context: NodeContext: Disappointed - almost sad - at how stupid Astarion's been

90.speaker: Cazador Szarr
90.text: You truly forgot my power. You truly thought our bond as creator and creation was all that stopped you from killing me.
90.context: NodeContext: Disappointed - almost sad - at how stupid Astarion's been

81.speaker: Cazador Szarr
81.text: You are weak, my child. You are a small, pathetic little boy who never amounted to anything.
81.context: NodeContext: Astarion's body is locked in place. He tries to resist, but can only grunt in pain

118.speaker: Astarion
118.context: NodeContext: Astarion's body is locked in place. He tries to resist, but can only grunt in pain

23.speaker: Cazador Szarr
23.text: But today, you will finally do something worthwhile. You will burn, and I will ascend.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Leaning in to whisper in Astarion's earNodeContext: Leans in to whisper in Astarion's ear

134.text: No! Stop him! And get me out of this!
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

3.text: No! Stop him! And get me out of this!
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Struggling against spectral chainsNodeContext: Desperate

33.speaker: Astarion
33.text: No! Stop him! And get me out of this!
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Struggling against spectral chainsNodeContext: Desperate

145.speaker: Cazador Szarr
145.text: Witness the birth of the Vampire Ascendant! Ecce dominus!

42.speaker: Player
42.text: What are you doing with those people?
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

109.speaker: Cazador Szarr
109.text: You came here wholly ignorant? With no concept of what you were about to witness?

6.speaker: Cazador Szarr
6.text: This is the Rite of Profane Ascension - attempted only once in legend.

92.speaker: Cazador Szarr
92.text: Seven thousand souls, each bearing the scar of the one who brought them to me, stand ready to be sacrificed.

144.speaker: Cazador Szarr
144.text: In their blood I shall be reborn, free to walk in the sun's rays. Free from sanguinary hunger. And free to crush any who stand against me with merciless power.

132.speaker: Cazador Szarr
132.text: Blessed are you to be the first I shall consume when I become the Vampire Ascendant.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: Careful, Astarion. Don't lose your head.
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

62.speaker: Cazador Szarr
62.text: Do the cattle not know you, boy? Have they not seen your fits of temper?
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

137.speaker: Astarion
137.context: CinematicNodeContext: About to leap at Cazador

123.speaker: Cazador Szarr
123.text: They told me you had changed. I dared not believe it.

14.speaker: Cazador Szarr
14.text: I suspected you would return to me changed. Never did I imagine you would be so wretched.

65.speaker: Cazador Szarr
65.text: Oh thankless child. Did I not bless you with our immortal gift? Did I not make you what you are?

136.speaker: Player
136.text: We know all about the ritual. We're here to stop you.
136.context: InternalNodeContext: 'This' referring to the playerNodeContext: Incredulous, esp. on 'this'

96.speaker: Player
96.context: InternalNodeContext: 'This' referring to the playerNodeContext: Incredulous, esp. on 'this'

0.speaker: Cazador Szarr
0.text: Have you fallen so far that this speaks for you?
0.context: InternalNodeContext: 'This' referring to the playerNodeContext: Incredulous, esp. on 'this'

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: I don't need anyone to speak for me.

147.speaker: Cazador Szarr
147.text: No, you always had a gift for words.

99.speaker: Cazador Szarr
99.text: I fondly remember your empty boasting, your tired jokes, your endless prattle...

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Astarion was afraid of you? You're pathetic.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: What in the Hells is going on here?

103.speaker: Cazador Szarr
103.text: Can it be? Is this our prodigal son standing before us?
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

26.speaker: Cazador Szarr
26.text: And this is how you present yourself to me? Some ragged traveller? Have you fallen so low without me?
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

115.speaker: Cazador Szarr
115.text: And after you abandoned us. You should be begging forgiveness, child.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

108.speaker: Astarion
108.text: I don't owe you a damn thing.
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

51.speaker: Cazador Szarr
51.text: You owe me everything, you fetid little rat.

143.speaker: Cazador Szarr
143.text: I gave you this immortal gift. I made you part of our great purpose. Part of something grander than you could ever be alone.

18.speaker: Astarion
18.text: I'm here to stop you and this cursed ritual.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

135.speaker: Cazador Szarr
135.text: Such ingratitude from one who owes me so much.

58.speaker: Astarion
58.text: What is this? Why are the others in chains?
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

36.speaker: Cazador Szarr
36.text: You came here wholly ignorant? With no concept of what you were about to witness?
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

49.speaker: Cazador Szarr
49.text: This is the Rite of Profane Ascension - attempted only once in legend.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

34.speaker: Cazador Szarr
34.text: In their blood I shall be reborn, free to walk in the sun's rays. Free from sanguinary hunger. And free to crush any who stand against me with merciless power.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

84.speaker: Cazador Szarr
84.text: I shaped you into what you are. Without me you are less than nothing.
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

61.speaker: Astarion
61.text: I've soared without you. I've walked in the sunlight.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

124.speaker: Cazador Szarr
124.text: A sweet irony that your destruction will grant me the same freedom.

38.speaker: Astarion
38.text: I've been free of your rules. I've tasted the blood of thinking creatures.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

32.speaker: Cazador Szarr
32.text: Look at how proud you are, you disobedient pup. But you forget yourself.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

107.speaker: Cazador Szarr
107.text: Even if you can resist my words, you are still mine, boy.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

93.speaker: Cazador Szarr
93.text: Now, it is time for you to join the others and complete our destiny.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures around, where we can see Cazador's other vampire servants trapped in spectral chains. (They're in a circle around the edges of the room)

138.speaker: Astarion
138.text: No. I'm not some goat to sacrifice in your ritual.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

79.speaker: Cazador Szarr
79.text: Do not flatter yourself, child. You are barely even a sacrifice - more a means to an end.

52.speaker: Astarion
52.text: What is this? What are you doing to them?
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

94.speaker: Cazador Szarr
94.text: Each of you children brought me a thousand souls. Now they stand marked with your scars, ready to be sacrificed.

70.speaker: Cazador Szarr
70.text: You were a means to an end. And the end is nigh.

30.speaker: Astarion
30.text: It's time for you to die.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

24.speaker: Cazador Szarr
24.text: Nay, child, I shall be reborn. I shall emerge more powerful than any of our kind has ever been!
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

57.speaker: Cazador Szarr
57.text: And you will serve your purpose. You were never more than a means to an end.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

46.speaker: Cazador Szarr
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

129.text: *You can feel tendrils of magic snaking through your veins, locking you in place.*
129.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cazador raises his staff and slams the butt of it against the floor.

45.text: *You can feel tendrils of magic snaking through your veins, locking you in place.*
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion's body jolts and shudders. He spasms, head tilted back, and is locked in place.

76.speaker: Narrator
76.text: *You can feel tendrils of magic snaking through your veins, locking you in place.*
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion's body jolts and shudders. He spasms, head tilted back, and is locked in place.

21.speaker: Cazador Szarr
21.text: All those souls you brought me, all linked through those lines I carved on your back. All linked through your blood.

133.speaker: Astarion
133.text: Resist his blood magic. Without allies, it's all over if he takes control of you.

13.speaker: Astarion
13.text: Force your body to resist - don't let him control you.

35.speaker: Narrator
35.text: *Your body locks, but it moves no further. You can feel Cazador trying to control you, but you fight the magic to a standstill.*

102.speaker: Narrator
102.text: *Your body locks, but it moves no further. You can feel Cazador trying to control you, but you fight the magic to a standstill.*

113.speaker: Cazador Szarr
113.text: Even now you resist? Very well, but you will not stop my ascent. Ecce dominus!

112.text: *You try to resist, but there's nothing you can do. Your body is riddled with the magic - you are his to control.*
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *You try to resist, but there's nothing you can do. Your body is riddled with the magic - you are his to control.*
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

72.speaker: Narrator
72.text: *The scars on your back flare to life, as if you can feel the knife in your flesh all over again.*
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a twist of his staff, Cazador hurls Astarion through the air, locking him in his spot for the ritual.

101.text: Now we will begin. Now you will witness the birth of the Vampire Ascendant.

47.speaker: Cazador Szarr
47.text: Now we will begin. Now you will witness the birth of the Vampire Ascendant.

69.speaker: Astarion
69.text: Give in, let him control you.

74.speaker: Narrator
74.text: *You relax into the magic's embrace, giving yourself up to its control.*

39.speaker: Astarion
39.text: And if I do join them?

98.speaker: Cazador Szarr
98.text: Two centuries in my service and you still think you have a choice in the matter? Stupid, stupid boy.

83.speaker: Astarion
83.text: You can't kill all these people. I won't let you.
83.context: NodeContext: almost disgust on the first line

85.speaker: Cazador Szarr
85.text: Did you grow a conscience, pup? It doesn't suit you.
85.context: NodeContext: almost disgust on the first line

37.speaker: Cazador Szarr
37.text: You could have found some nice, deep hole to cower in, but no. You marched straight back here.
37.context: NodeContext: almost disgust on the first line

77.speaker: Astarion
77.text: I'm an angel of vengeance. That's what you made me.

100.speaker: Cazador Szarr
100.text: Why do you insist on such grand notions, so far removed from reality?

126.speaker: Astarion
126.text: We're finishing this ritual. But I'm taking the power, not you.

88.speaker: Cazador Szarr
88.text: Ha! Have you lost all leave of your senses?

44.speaker: Astarion
44.text: Soon you'll be begging for your life.

55.speaker: Cazador Szarr
55.text: You dare speak thusly to me?

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: I am here to take my rightful place. I'm going to ascend.

64.speaker: Cazador Szarr
64.text: I always knew you to be a fool, but I never thought you delusional.

87.speaker: Cazador Szarr
87.text: The Rite of Profane Ascension is not some playbook to be picked up and read from. You cannot simply drop one role and assume another.

110.speaker: Cazador Szarr
110.text: Read the rites and you will be destroyed. I would almost like you to try, just to watch you burn.

12.speaker: Cazador Szarr
12.text: Thankfully, your life is not yours to squander. You belong to me, boy. And you will fulfil your purpose.

140.speaker: Cazador Szarr
140.text: You returned! And true to your word, our prodigal son stands before us.
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion starts to hunch - like an angry, cornered dog
